name: client
description: Vue.js client source code of the transition connect management gui.
author: Roger Waldvogel <info@elyoos.org>

scripts.build-public: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify --exclude vue --exclude vee-validate --exclude vuex  --exclude axios -g envify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o ../server/static/styles/public.css ] -e src/public/main.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > ../server/static/lib/dist/public.min.js
scripts.build-admin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify --exclude vue --exclude vee-validate --exclude vuex  --exclude axios -g envify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o ../server/static/styles/admin.css ] -e src/admin/main.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > ../server/static/lib/dist/admin.min.js
